candidates.title: Specifications. Alienware AW720M - Manualzz
candidates.snippet: Alienware AW720M is a versatile gaming mouse that provides precise control, customizable settings, and seamless connectivity for an immersive gaming experience. With its magnetic snap charging function, adjustable DPI settings, and the ability to switch between wired and wireless modes, the AW720M adapts to your gaming needs effortlessly.

candidates.title: PDF Alienware Tri-mode Wireless Gaming Mouse - Aw720m
candidates.snippet: ONE-OF-A-KIND DESIGN Eight programmable buttons and 3D-sculpted thumb grips pair with a slimmer, more symmetrical design for an enhanced, ambidextrous grip. When it comes to looks, the AW720M is in a class of its own, thanks to iconic Alienware design and AlienFX RGB lighting that syncs with the Alienware Command Center.
